Texts.Eng: Spacefaring and Vehicles

Texts.Chs: 强力机器人

Texts.Eng: Superior Mech Weapons

Texts.Chs: 高级网络
Texts.Eng: Superior Networks

Texts.Chs: 高级科技
Texts.Eng: Superior Techs

Texts.Chs: 高级载具
Texts.Eng: Supreme Vehicles

Texts.Chs: 地质改造

Texts.Eng: Upgrade Crafting

Texts.Eng: Vehicle Creation

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你现在可以在在改造台上制造各种而样的音乐盒。用这些音乐和可以播放Starbound，Frackin'Universe或已安装的Frackin'Music中的任何音乐。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You can now create a variety of music boxes at your Tinkering Table. These can play any music from Starbound, Frackin' Universe or the add-on Frackin' Music, if you have it installed.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你正在学习工程学不仅仅是创造新的东西，而是在你已经创造的东西基础上进行改进。为了达到这个目的，你已经学会了创建一张^orange;改造台^reset;，改造台允许你制作EPP模块，小型的设备，特别的武器升级，和有用的工具，如钩爪或采矿激光。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You're learning that engineering isn't just about making new things, but improving on the ones you already made. To this end, you've learned to create a ^orange;Tinkering Table^reset; which will allow you to make EPP modules, mining gear, special weapon upgrades, and useful tools such as a Hookshot or Mining Laser.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经开发了许多有用的工具。它们的功能可以通过使用物质枪模块升级改进。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've developed a number of useful tools. Their functionality can be improved by upgrading them with manipulator modules.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经有能力制造各种更有用的挖掘工具。特别值得注意的是采矿激光，它可以使用物质枪模块升级，消耗能量而并非耐久。只要升级的次数够多，采矿的速度就能相当快，这是一笔值得的投资。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've gained the ability to make a variety of more useful mining tools. Of particular note is the Mining Laser, which can be upgraded with Manipulator Modules and uses your energy instead of durability. With enough upgrades, they get quite fast, and are a worthy investment.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经学会了制作自己的躯体增强科技，并且可以在你的^orange;个人三度仪^reset;处制作一些基本的科技。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to make your own body-enhancing Techs and can create a few basic ones in your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;.

^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Your spaceship may have broken down, but that doesn't mean you can't fix it. Using parts from your old junked FTL drive and the thermal power of Core Fragments, you are now able to make a basic ship engine (^cyan;STL Engine^reset;, created at a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;).

While fine for intrastellar travel, the STL engine isn't nearly powerful enough to leave your system - you'll need to ^orange;Research^reset; proper FTL technology to do that.

If ^cyan;Fuel^reset; is proving an issue to find for your ship: head to a ^green;Moon^reset; or produce some ^cyan;Hydrogen^reset; by processing water (via ^orange;Extraction^reset; or ^orange;Centrifuge^reset;).

 Additionally, you can craft a very simple mech for EVA or planetary usage (created at a ^orange;Mech Part Crafting Table^reset;. You can ^green;Research^reset; one later, or use the one at the ^orange;Outpost^reset;).

Mechs will provide a large amount of damage resistance and help you stay alive for longer in harsh situations, and are able to ^green;Fly^reset; in an atmosphere as well as space.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

金元素在计算机领域有许多有用的应用。现在，您可以将其用于创建实用的处理器和内存棒。首先请务必将你的加工台升级为^orange;自动组装器^reset;！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Gold has many useful applications in computing. You can now put it to use in the creation of useful processors and RAM sticks. Make sure to upgrade your Machining Table into an ^orange;Auto Assembler^reset; first!

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

萃取实验室比手工粉碎机进步了一大步，且工作速度更快。你需要许多萃取实验室来处理各种各样的资源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The extraction lab is a big step up over the hand mill, working much more quickly. You'll want many extraction labs to process all sorts of resources.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

石墨烯这种奇妙的材料的导电性远远好于单质碳原子。有了它，你就可以制造出非常耐用、耐热的电路，这些电路将在重型机械中派上用场。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The wonderful material known as Graphene conducts electricity far better than its carbon origins might indicate. With it, you can create very durable, heat resistant circuits that will be useful in heavy machinery.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

根据你的工程学知识，你已经设计了一些机械的可拆卸机器仆从来帮助你。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With your engineering knowledge, you have designed a few basic depolyable robot minions to help you out.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以制作改进的科技，提供更加的效率和功能。你可以在^orange;个人三度仪^reset;处制作这些科技。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make improved Techs that provide greater utility and function. They are accessed via your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你现在可以在你的加工台上创建各种有用的家具，尽管你可能必须首先升级它才能做到这一点。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can now create a variety of helpful objects at your Machining Table, though you may have to upgrade it first to do so.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你可以制造大量的装饰性飞船物品。他们没啥用，但也许他们会让你的船看起来更酷？
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You gain access to a large number of decorative ship objects. They don't do anything, but maybe they'll make your ship look cooler?

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经设计了一个飞船部设备制造台来生产更先进的飞船部件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've designed a Ship Crafting Table to produce more advanced ship components.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经开发了一套简单的EPP模块，你可以安装这些模块以获得处EPP本身以外提供的增益。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've developed a suite of simple EPP modules which can be installed to gain useful benefits in addition to the effects your EPP already provides.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经把你对计算机部件的知识用于生产便携的笔记本电脑，这些电脑将自动为你生成研究点数。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've put your knowledge of computer parts to use to produce handy laptops that will automatically generate research for you.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

可以进行量子计算意味着你可以制造更强大的计算机，更快地研究和存储更多的数据。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Access to quantum computing means you can make stronger computers that research more quickly and store more data.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

它可能会迟到，但它肯定能很快地完成我的工作。您可以制造一些更易于使用的挖掘工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

They may not last forever, but they sure do mine fast. You gain access to a few more consumable mining tools.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

研究结果表明，制造很酷的载具与制造宇宙飞船并没有太大的区别。你可以制造潜艇和直升机，既可以在太空中也可以在大气中运行。在你的自动组转器/物质汇编器处制造这些载具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Turns out making cool vehicles isn't too different from working with spaceships. You can make submarines and VTOL craft that can operate both in space and in atmosphere. Make them at your Auto Assembler/Matter Assembler.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

使用你的微型工程知识，你现在可以在你的自动装配机上制造自己的升级模块，物质枪模块和科技卡。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Using your knowledge of microengineering, you can now fabricate your own upgrade modules, manipulator modules and tech cards at your Auto Assembler.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

随着技能的增加，制造更先进的机械身体的能力增强，这些机械身体可以抵抗伤害，储存更多燃料，并且更容易在危险环境中生存。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

With increased crafting skill comes the ability to make more advanced mech bodies that resist damage and store more fuel and survive in dangerous atmospheres more easily.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你现在可以为你的机甲制造更好的模块，这些模块可以提供更好的属性或增强的效力。你也可以制作机甲零件用的接口芯片。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can now craft better modules for your mech which grant better stats or increased utility. You can also craft Interface Chips for use in mech parts.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

您已经设计了许多新的 EPP 模块，它们将保护您免受热、辐射、寒冷和其他危险。在充满敌意的环境中生存从来没有这么容易过。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a lot of new EPP modules which will protect you from heat, radiation, cold and other hazards. Surviving hostile environments has never been so easy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经设计了三种强大的能量核心，每种都有自己的科学和军事应用的清单。熔火核心是优于处理强烈的热量，如在鼓风炉或熔岩喷射器。能量核心有用在动力学应用，是许多运动部件和高端弹道武器的实用部件。核能核心可以用来引导辐射，比如在裂变反应堆中，或者只是为高能量需求的发明制造大量的能量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a trio of powerful energy cores, each with their own laundry list of scientific and military applications. Molten Cores are excellent when dealing with intense heat such as in blast furnaces or lava-spewing flamethrowers. Power Cores shine in kinetic applications, and are useful in machines with many moving parts and high-end ballistic weaponry. Nuclear Cores are useful for channeling radiation, such as in a fission reactor, or just plain making tons of energy for high-demand inventions.

^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've greatly improved upon your extraction lab design, producing a lab that is faster than ever at processing resources and even gives some bonus outputs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经改进了机甲的运动系统，现在可以制造更快的腿和助推器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved on the movement systems of your mech and can now craft faster legs and boosters.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经改进了你的超光速设计，允许制造更大，更强大的引擎，并找到了进一步净化和加强你的飞船的燃料的方法。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved on your FTL design, allowing for the creation of bigger, more powerful engines and a way to further purify and enhance your ship's fuel.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经改进了EPP模块的设计，为许多模块开发升级，并发明了一些新的模块。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon your EPP module design, developing upgrades for many of your modules and inventing a few new ones, too.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了为你的机甲制造更强大的武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to make some stronger weaponry for your mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了在^orange;原子炉^reset;处制造空间效率高的电池，这些电池可以用作机械和一些武器的备用动力源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to make space-efficient batteries at an ^orange;Atomic Furnace^reset; which will be useful as surplus power sources in machinery and some weapons.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经把原体物质疯狂的能量转移特性用在高度复杂的处理器与量子位 - 不再只是1或0，有时两者兼具！量子处理器在高端电子产品中有许多用途。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've put the insane energy-transferring properties of Protocite to work in highly complex processors which work with quantum bits - no longer just 1 or 0, but sometimes both! Quantum Procesors have many uses in higher-end electronics.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你你的实验已经创造了一些很酷的新玩具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your experimentation has led to the creation of a few cool new toys.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你你的机器人知识正在增长，其在你手边的新设计中显示出来。你现在可以使用更强大的机器人了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your robotic knowledge is growing, and it shows in your handy new designs. You now have access to stronger robots.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

通过将量子计算和特殊的晶体结合起来，你可以创造出能量聚焦装置，这种装置在高科技机器和强大的能量武器中都非常出色。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

By combining quantum computing with specialized crystals, you can create energy-focusing devices that are excellent in high-tech machines as well as powerful energy weapons.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

仅仅跑快是不够的，你必须跑得非常非常快。通过新改进的科技，你离这个目标又近了一步。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

It's not enough to just go fast - you've got to go really, really fast. You're one step closer to that goal with your newly improved designs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你不再需要付钱给专业人士 - 你就是那样的专业人士！你可以自己制作各种个人传送器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

No longer do you need to pay a professional - you ^green;are^reset; that professional! You can make a variety of personal teleporters on your own.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

宇宙可能是一个危险的地方，但是如果你有一把真正的大枪的话就没事了。你可以制造更好的机甲武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

The universe can be a dangerous place, but not if you've got a really big gun. You can make even better mech weapons.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

使用人工智能技术，你设计了一个数据塔，它将为你的利益产生大量的研究成果，远远超过之前所有的计算机。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

With AI technology, you've designed a data tower which will generate huge amounts of research for your benefit, vastly outstripping all computers that came before it.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你可以制造更好的机械模块和纳米插座，它们是高级机械的关键部件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You are able to craft even better mech modules as well as Nano Receptacles, which are key components in advanced mechs.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你可以制作显著改进的科技，提供更多的好处。你可以^orange;个人三度仪^reset;处制作这些科技。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make significantly improved Techs that provide even more benefit. They are accessed via your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你现在可以使用更复杂的材料制造更强大的机甲躯体。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can now make even stronger mech bodies using more complex materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你是制造战斗无人机的大师。你最新的创造物比以往任何时候都更加致命，而且会很好地保护你。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You're a master at making combat drones. Your latest creations are deadlier than ever and will protect you quite nicely.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经广泛地研究过厄尔吉斯晶体，并且对它们的功能性有了很多了解。你可以建造更好的FTL引擎和燃料净化器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've studied erchius crystals extensively and know a great deal about their functionality. You can build even better FTL drives and fuel purifiers.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你的防御模块已经变得更加强大，允许你抵抗更多的奇异元素，如射线和暗影，并完全防御炎热，寒冷或放射性行星的侵害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your defensive modules have gotten even better, allowing you to resist more exotic elements like Cosmic and Shadow and completely protect from hot, cold or radioactive planets.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你你的技能和紧凑电源使你可以制造两个更有用的核心，极大地扩展了你的工程能力。传送器核心完美运用于运输和建设大型的自动化项目网络，而粒子核心是沟道原子和亚原子粒子的绝佳零件 - 例如强大的激光中的光子。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your skill with compact power sources has allowed you to make two more useful cores, expanding your engineering capability greatly. Teleporter Cores are perfect for transportation and constructing large, automated item networks, while Particle Cores are unmatched at channeling atomic and subatomic particles - the photons in a powerful laser, for example.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

由于你的机械制造天赋，周围最强壮的机甲身体现在在你的能力范围之内。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The strongest mech bodies around are now within your ability thanks to your mech-building talent.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

在你看来，如果你不能在机甲上绑上一个BFG，然后骑着值得拥有它的人(或东西)进城，那么你就没有理由拥有一个机甲。你们最新的致命机甲武器就是完美的武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The way you see it, there's no reason to own a mech if you can't strap a BFG to it and go to town on someone (or something) that deserves it. Your newest death-dealing mech weapons are perfect for doing just that.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

通过古代精华和强大的粒子聚焦器的结合，你现在可以使用微型设备改变一个星球的一小部分来更好地满足你的欲望。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Through the combination of Ancient Essence and robust particle focusers, you can now alter a small part of a planet to better suit your desires using microformation devices.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

随着能够使用异极合金，即使是人工智能技术也是触手可及的，它可以创造出能够自我改进和基本决策的超高速计算机组件。毫不奇怪，许多政府完全禁止这项技术，因为害怕它能做出什么惊人的事情。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With access to Morphite, even AI technology is within your reach, allowing the creation of supremely fast computing components that are capable of self-improvement and basic decision-making. It's no surprise that many governments ban this technology outright for fear of what amazing things it can do.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

随着对EPP模块的掌握，你制作出一些新的神器作品，它们将提供难以置信的增益。除了改进你已经如老朋友般熟悉的设计，你甚至可以抵御厄尔吉斯幽灵，精神错乱，纯粹的黑暗，甚至不再需要进食！
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With mastery of EPP modules comes several new amazingly useful creations that will provide incredible benefits. In addition to improving your already considerably impressive designs, you can even ward off Erchius Ghosts, insanity, sheer darkness or the need to eat!

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你可以制造更强大机甲模块，也可以制造纳米插座，大多数顶级机甲部件的成分。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can make more powerful mech modules and can also craft Nano Receptacles, the ingredient in most top-tier mech parts.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

现在，你可以根据自己的喜好对整个行星进行改造，将其环境改造为新的类型。 请注意，改造不适用于海洋世界，这就是为什么不存在这样的地形转换器的原因。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can now shape entire planets to your liking, altering their environment to new types. Note that this will not work for Ocean worlds, which is why no such terraformers exist.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你是整个宇宙级中最好的技术工程师之一，你的创造物几乎是该领域所有人羡慕的对象。你可以制造非常强大的科技。你可以^orange;个人三度仪^reset;处制作这些科技。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You're one of the best tech engineers in the whole galaxy, and your creations are the envy of just about everyone in the field. You can make extremely powerful techs. They are accessed via your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你的人工智能现在是超级先进的，并且为你的利益产生大量的研究，允许你踢掉你的鞋子，最终让一些东西为你做你可以依赖的工作。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your AI is super-advanced now, and generate huge amounts of research for your benefit, allowing you to kick off your shoes and finally let something do the work for you that you can rely on.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你对进步的渴望已经引导你去用异级合金实验全新的，超级可怕的物质枪，以及一些其他的副产物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your desire for progress has led you to experiment with Morphite to plan a brand-new, super-awesome Matter Manipulator, as well as a few other creations on the side.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你对超光速技术的了解对除了你之外的任何人来说都是难以置信的。你可以制造最快的FTL引起和助推器，并且可以非常有效地净化和增强FTL燃料，你现在只需要几滴燃料就可以穿越星系间的距离。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your knowledge of FTL tech is mind-boggling to anyone but you. You can make the fastest FTL drives and boosters around, and can purify and enhance FTL fuel so efficiently that you can cross the distance between stars with only a few drops of fuel.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

你的天赋创造了一些最高端的机甲部件，让你以创纪录的速度奔跑、跳跃和驾驶你的机甲穿越星球。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Your talent has produced some of the highest-end mech parts around, letting you run, jump and fly your mech through the stars at record pace.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

由于你对地质改造装置的理解，你甚至可以将整个行星改变成想要的形态。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Thanks to your understanding of terraforming devices you can now create even more interesting forms of worlds.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

事实证明，你可以做得更好，而不仅仅是异级合金。通过量子物质枪，你可以改写现实世界本身的结构，在创纪录的时间内挖掘出大量的物质。如果守护团还存在的话，他们会嫉妒死的。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Turns out you could do better than just Morphite. With a Quantum Manipulator, you can rewrite the fabric of reality itself to excavate vast amounts of material in record time. The Protectorate would be quite jealous, if it still existed.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你通晓模块化机甲的一切。你可以制造非常神奇的机甲部件，让竞争者望尘莫及。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You know everything there is to know about modular mechs. You can make extremely amazing mech parts that blow the competition away.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你已经设计了更多的载具，更加致命，更快，更加耐用，全方位全能，超级实用。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've designed a couple more vehicles that are deadlier, faster, more durable and all around, super useful.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你脑子里有太多的想法，除了把它们都写在纸上，没有别的事可做。你现在可以升级一些已经存在的武器到怪异和致命的新形态。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've just got so many ideas floating around in your head that there's nothing else to do but put them all onto paper. You can now upgrade several pre-existing weapons into bizarre and lethal new forms.
